[[Image:The 1990 NOT Tolkien Calendar.jp: '''The 1990 NOT Tolkien Calendar''' satirical calendar was produced by the [[Mythopoeic Society]] with black and white illustrations by [[Paula Di Sante]], [[Christine Lowentrout]], [[Sylvia Hunnewell]], [[Sarah Beach]], [[Tim Callahan]], [[Pat Wynne]], [[Bonnie Callahan]], and [[Nancy-Lou Patterson]], and [[Lynn Maudlin]], who coordinated and assembled the project. Conceived by [[Lynn Maudlin]] and [[Christine Lowentrout]] (aka Sherwood Smith, the author).
